titleStmt.title: Cum bono deo. A remonstrance to the Godly party. Two maine quæries, which stand much usefull fo these our times. ... And a vindication of both. / By Andrew Logie sometime Arch-Deane of Aberdene; Penned by the author, ann. 1654, and printed 1661.
titleStmt.author: Logie, Andrew.

notesStmt.note: Place of publication suggested by Wing.
Reproduction of the original in the National Library of Scotland.
